title: Russ Rankin from Good Riddance
itunes:title: Russ Rankin from Good Riddance
description:
It's a big one today with the vocalist from Good Riddance, Russ Rankin! Good Riddance has always loomed large within the punk and hardcore community, so it was a pleasure to have Russ on to discuss the idea of "being too punk to be hardcore," the music business and of course, animal rights. It's a wide ranging chat and we of course mention hockey as well. Thanks for listening!

Visit Rockabilia and use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order.
